entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to by his first name. The crowd is reacting to him being alive.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The antagonist of the story, also known as Lord Voldemort. He is described as having red eyes and is circling Harry.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Another name for Harry Potter, used by Voldemort to refer to him.

relationships.description: Harry and Voldemort are circling each other, as described in the text: 'and began, at the same moment, to circle each other.'
